name: Lobolobo
description:
Cure the sick guardian of this weird world !

Move - Arrows

Hit - W

Wash / Speak - X

Khamsou - Design, Prog, Art

Relou - Art

Antoyne - SFX

CyanideDansen - Music

Can also be played at http://www.khamsou.fr/lobolobo

Soundtrack : https://cyanidedansen.bandcamp.com/album/lobolobo-soundtrack
